author: Michael White
title: $7.3M headed to hard-hit mountain towns for Helene recovery
text:
About $7.3 million in state grants will be going to help four western North Carolina communities rebuild after Hurricane Helene, officials said Thursday.
Five projects in Chimney Rock will receive the lion‚Äôs share of the grant funds ‚Äî a total of $5.5 million ‚Äî but Clyde, Gamewell and Morganton also will get money for tasks that help small businesses by fixing damaged infrastructure, the North Carolina Commerce Department said in a news release .
The projects include replacing damaged sections of streets in Chimney Rock, which was hit particularly hard by Helene , to improve safety and access to the town‚Äôs business district and rehabilitating a Morganton boardwalk that connects to riverfront businesses, the agency said.
"Small businesses are the backbone of our economy, especially in western North Carolina, and this first round of infrastructure grants marks another important milestone on the road to recovery,‚Äù said Gov. Josh Stein said in the release. ‚ÄúI thank the legislature for funding these infrastructure investments.‚Äù
The Commerce Department recovery program uses money set aside by the General Assembly early this year for disaster recovery.
Lawmakers last month approved another round of storm relief funding ‚Äî putting $700 million into a state fund and sending $500 million of that to recovery efforts in western North Carolina ‚Äî and Stein signed the measure June 27 during the reopening of Chimney Rock State Park.
The iconic park had been closed since the storm struck in September.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news

author: News 12 Staff
title: Bright and brisk Tuesday for the Hudson Valley
text: News 12 Storm Watch Team Meteorologist Hope Osemwenkhae says it will be a bright and brisk Tuesday for the Hudson Valley. WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW: - No advisories at this time. - Partly cloudy and frigid overnight. Lows in the 20s. - Brighter, brisk and breezy on Tuesday. Highs in the 40s. Wind chills in the 20s and 30s. - Quiet and chilly through Wednesday. - Mostly cloudy, with a slight chance of rain/snow showers Thursday afternoon. Higher chance south of the area. - A bigger storm system could bring a greater chance for rain/ snow mix on Sunday. The News 12 Storm Watch Team is still tracking this system and will let you know the exact timing and impacts in the next few days. FORECAST OVERNIGHT: Partly cloudy and frigid. Lows near 26. TUESDAY: Very cold start, brighter, and brisk. Highs near 41. Lows near 30. WEDNESDAY: Sun and clouds, chilly, less breezy. Highs near 46. Lows near 32. THURSDAY: Partly sunny, chilly. Chance of a passing rain/snow shower. Highs near 41. Lows near 23. FRIDAY: Bitter cold. Brighter, breezy and colder. Highs near 37. Low of 25. SATURDAY: Partly sunny, chilly, breezy, chance of afternoon rain/snow mix. Highs near 40. Lows near 30. SUNDAY: Mostly cloudy, breezy, chance of rain/snow mix. Highs near 38. Lows near 31. MONDAY: Mostly sunny with a brisk breeze. Highs near 37. Lows near 26.

organizations.name: hudson valley news 12 storm watch team meteorologist hope osemwenkhae

author: Editorial Mediotiempo
title: Toni Kroos supera a jugador de la NBA en concurso de triples: VIDEO | Mediotiempo
text: A exactamente dos meses de que Toni Kroos jugara ante Espa√±a en la Eurocopa 2024 el √∫ltimo partido de su carrera, se ha mantenido activo en redes sociales y volvi√≥ a jugar en The Icon League, adem√°s se dio tiempo de jugar basquetbol.Kroos enfrent√≥ un reto ante el jugador de la NBA, Dennis Schr√∂der, en el que compitieron luego de un encuentro de la liga en la que participa ahora el ex mediocampista del Real Madrid y lo hicieron en el terreno de Schr√∂der, lanzando triples. En un vido que circula en redes sociales se puede ver al futbolista alem√°n vencer al actual jugador de los Brooklyn Nets por supuesto marcador de cinco tiros anotados por tres de Dennis, sin embargo, ese video est√° editado a favor de Kroos. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Overtime FC (@overtimefc) Por otro lado, en el propio perfil del ex seleccionado de futbol alem√°n se puede ver la realidad en la que, s√≠, perdi√≥ en tiros de basquetbol ante un jugador de basquetbol (obvio, ¬øno?) por marcador de nueve a favor de Schr√∂der por seis de Kroos.De todos modos, sus seguidores y otros usuarios de redes sociales reconocieron la calidad de Toni para tirar hacia el aro, con una parecida precisi√≥n a sus pases, aunque nunca como verlo con esos caracter√≠sticos botines dirigir la media cancha. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Toni Kroos (@toni.kr8s) Brilla The Icon LeagueEn un formato parecido a la Kings League de Gerard Piqu√©, Toni Kroos encabeza The Icon League que se celebra en la Lanxess Arena de Colonia, en Alemania, con la participaci√≥n tambi√©n de jugadores y creadores de contenido.Han participado, entre algunos de los m√°s conocidos, Franck Rib√©ry, Alphonso Davies, Breel Embolo, David Alaba, Antonio R√ºdiger y Robert Andrich, entre otros jugadores que empiezan a fortalecer esta liga que intentar√° competir.
